name: Genius-level intellect
description: Possesses an exceptionally high intelligence quotient (IQ) and is capable of advanced problem-solving, analysis, and innovation.

name: Expert engineer and inventor
description: Skilled in various fields of engineering and capable of inventing and constructing complex technological devices and gadgets.

name: Powered armor suit
description: Wears a technologically advanced suit of armor that grants superhuman strength, flight, and an array of advanced weaponry.

name: Master tactician and strategist
description: Highly skilled in planning and executing strategies and tactics in combat and other situations.

name: Peak human strength
description: Possesses physical strength at the upper limits of human potential, but not superhuman.

name: Master martial artist and hand-to-hand combatant
description: Highly skilled in various forms of martial arts and unarmed combat techniques.

name: Vibranium shield mastery
description: Highly skilled in using a shield made of vibranium, capable of absorbing and redirecting kinetic energy.

name: Leadership skills
description: Naturally possesses the ability to lead and inspire others in combat and other situations.

name: Mjolnir (enchanted hammer) mastery
description: Possesses the ability to wield Mjolnir, an enchanted hammer that grants control over lightning and weather.

name: Wall-crawling
description: Capable of adhering to and scaling vertical surfaces using adhesive forces.

name: Spider-sense
description: A precognitive ability that warns of imminent danger, allowing for quick reflexive responses.

name: Web-shooters and web-fluid
description: Uses wrist-mounted devices to shoot and swing from webs made of a special adhesive fluid.

name: Unlimited superhuman strength
description: Possesses unlimited strength that increases with anger, allowing for incredible feats of physical power.

name: Regenerative healing factor
description: Capable of rapidly healing from injuries, including regrowing lost tissue and organs.

name: Invulnerability
description: Immune to most forms of physical harm and injury.

name: Gamma radiation absorption
description: Absorbs gamma radiation, which increases strength and durability but may trigger transformation into a powerful alter ego.

name: Expert marksman and weapons specialist
description: Highly skilled in the use of firearms and various weapons, with exceptional accuracy and proficiency.

name: Espionage expertise
description: Skilled in covert operations, intelligence gathering, and stealth tactics.

name: Mastery of the mystic arts
description: Possesses extensive knowledge and skill in using mystical energies and incantations for various purposes.

name: Time manipulation
description: Capable of manipulating the flow of time, including time travel and time loops.
